description: Whether your passion lies in FPS, MMORPG, or RTS games, the Razer Nostromo™ gaming keypad is designed to give you the upper hand with cutting edge ergonomics designed for intuitive game control while you play in complete comfort. With an arsenal of tournament-grade controls including 16 fully programmable Hyperesponse™ keys, 8 keymaps that you can switch between on the fly, and an 8-way directional thumb pad all integrated into one dedicated gaming keypad, you’re prepared to take on all challengers.            Features     Adjustable soft-touch wrist padErgonomic form factorProgrammable 8-way directional thumb padBacklit keypad and scroll wheel16 fully programmable Hyperesponse™ keys20 different game profiles
title: Razer Nostromo PC Gaming Keypad
